credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Church Facade
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pencil, pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash on paper
description: Incomplete drawing of a church facade with a side tower (at left).   The most finished section of the drawing is at the lower left.  Two stories facade with series of columns and pilasters alternating with arches and windows.
name: Drawing
